page.title: 06JOB SURVEY
page.content: 1.DO YOU HAVE A JOB? YES 60% NO 40% 2.DIFFERENT TYPES OF JOBS a/HELPING AND CARING=18% b/FORCES(INCLUDING POLICE)=18% c/WORKING IN A SHOP=10% d/WORKING IN A LARGE FACTORY=44% e/COMPUTING ETC=10% 3.UNEMPLOYED AFTER LEAVING SCHOOL YES 10% NO 90% 4.JOB PROSPECTS,GOOD 60%,BAD 40% 5.DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR JOB IS SECURE? YES 50% NO 10% DONT KNOW 40% 6.IS THIS YOUR FIRST JOB? YES 55% NO 45% 7.HOW DOES GLENROTHES COMPARE WITH THE JOBS AVAILABLE IN YOUR PREVIOUS AREA? SIMILAR 40% BETTER 40% WORSE 20% 8.WHAT WOULD HELP EMPLOYMENT IN GLENROTHES? A/LOWERING RATES-18%,B/GOVERNMENT HELP -27%,C/MORE APPRENTICESHIPS-27% D/DON'T KNOW-28%
